content: "http://www.dodbuzz.com/2009/03/27/afghan-strategy-begins-soft-power-shift/?wh=wh" Sounds like we're really moving towards funding up soft power in Afghanistan. Kinetics aren't everything, as our recent strategy in Iraq proved. It's necessary to have a coherent framework of soft power (political settlement, aid, etc.) in order to achieve any kind of a peace in Afghanistan. Pure kinetics have a tendency to turn people against us.
